overall_goal: Shell and separate ground nuts from their shells using a combination of manual and mechanical methods.

clips.subgoal: Perform initial shelling of ground nuts manually

sub_clips.secondary_subgoal: Pick up and handle ground nuts and their shells
Remove ground nuts from their shells manually and put them in the clay pot
Stir and move ground nuts and shells in the clay pot to separate them
Put ground nuts shells in the winnowing tray

clips.subgoal: Continue separating ground nuts from shells

sub_clips.secondary_subgoal: Pick ground nut shells and nuts from the clay pot and put shells in the winnowing tray

clips.subgoal: Use a peanut sheller to break the ground nut shells

sub_clips.secondary_subgoal: Move ground nut shells into the peanut sheller and operate it
